body:
So, it turns out that there is not yet a version of `torch.eye` that works directly on the GPU.
I implemented it in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2395 , so once it's merged, you could do something like
```python
mat = torch.eye(A.size(0), out=A.data.new()) * (-0.5) + 1
```
